about_the_game:
Get a taste of the night racer experience by playing the demo. The game gives you access to 2 arcade mode levels, 2 time levels in time trial mode, 1 championship and finally you get to play 3 games in the multiplayer mode.

The full game has a more of what's there in the demo. Below is a list of the features we have. Join our discord for a chance to win the giveaway.

Compete in 4 different game modes
Multiplayer, Championship, Arcade and Time Trial.
Cross-Platform Multiplayer Support
Compete against others on the Leaderboards

Cars, Cars, Cars...
Over 8 different cars to choose from, ranging from Sports cars to Vintage cars.
Customize your cars with new Skins, Toppers and Boosters.
Collect coins to upgrade your cars to be the best they can be.

Vroom Vroom Vroom...
9 different tracks, each have their own sets of obstacles and challenges for you to overcome and emerge victorious.
8 Different Championships to playthrough
Play through all the levels in arcade mode and time trial

While you're racing watch out for the opponents who like to go rogue and push you off the edges of the track.

ABOUT US
Smash Game Studios is an Indie Game company focused on creating compelling experience for Mobile, PC and New Emerging Platforms. We're best known for our games The Last Train.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mint 18 / Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

name: Night Racer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k or greater, 3.3ghz+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 / 2060super or greater

short_description: Get a taste of the night racer experience by playing the demo. The game gives you access to 2 arcade mode levels, 2 time levels in time trial mode, 1 championship and finally you get to play 3 games in the multiplayer mode.
